hero-desc-1: I'm Nyuu, a Computer Science student specializing in DevOps and System Administration.
hero-desc-2: Let's tackle your next challenge together. I'm available for freelance projects and open to collaborations.
syncr-desc: Open-source web application (in development) designed to synchronize, move, and copy files across remote storage services. Compatible with Amazon S3 and SFTP. Features include scheduled jobs, notifications, multi-user support, and full self-hosting via Docker.
miners-desc: A Minecraft community project featuring the largest open-source Brazilian documentation for server administrators. Offers problem-solving guides, tips, and best practices for managing Minecraft servers.
tryxia-desc: A discontinued free Minecraft hosting service created as a learning project. Provided hands-on experience with server hosting, administration, and troubleshooting in real-world scenarios.
tryxia-desc-2: Before it's closing, the project had a total of 200+ users and 70+ game servers.
stack-desc: Languages and tools that I worked with, in order of knowledge by category.
education-desc: Advancing my knowledge through studies, courses and certifications.
upf-title: Computer Science | University of Passo Fundo
upf-desc: Exploring the computing architecture and principles, applying academic rigor to my projects and the real-world.
ckac-desc: Preparation and content for the CKA Certification, with Kubernetes cluster administration, design, testing, building and networking.
ltc-desc: Comprehensive Linux training course, covering everything from fundamentals to advanced topics, including system administration, security, and automation.
drf-desc: Serialization, Test Driven Development, Permissions, Authentications, Throttling and API design.
msa-desc: Basic understanding of microservices architecture, patterns, communication and implementation.
zab-desc: Basic understanding of monitoring Linux and Windows machines and applications with Zabbix.
kab-desc: Basic understanding of Kubernetes Fundamentals, Configuration and Deployment.
fbe-desc: Understanding of backend communication patterns, protocols, execution and proxying.
djm-desc: Fundamentals of Django, REST framework, customization and design patterns.
cka-desc: Demonstrated the ability to do basic installation as well as configuring and managing production-grade Kubernetes clusters.
services-game-desc: Whether it's for a personal game server or a hosting company, I deliver tailored solutions. Any hardware, any location, any time.
services-app-desc: Your applications need a reliable home online! I'll design hosting solutions that keep them running smoothly and always available.
services-panel-desc: From advanced monitoring with Grafana, Prometheus, or Zabbix, to virtualization with Proxmox, VirtFusion, or Virtualizor, and even billing systems like WHMCS. I set up panels to match any need.
services-backups-desc: Backups are only useful if they're tested and follow the 3-2-1 rule. I'll implement reliable backup and disaster recovery plans across multiple providers and locations, customized to your preferences.
services-custom-desc: Need something different? Let's discuss any installation, configuration, maintenance, or managed service you have in mind. Just reach out!
cta-desc: I'm always available on Discord and via email!
name: Name:
psa-design: I apologize for the website design, frontend is not my strength.
form-inside-title: Leave me a message and I will respond as soon as possible!
form-socials: You can also get in touch through my networks:
form-status-success: Your message has been sent successfully!
form-status-error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again or get in touch manually with me
